answers.answer: Hello, i found out i am 6 weeks pregnant and baby due on my birthday 22nd April, very nervous as its my first and i hate needles lol i wish you well x

I figured my due date to be April 28th! This is my first and I'm so excited. Not too many symptoms so far...a little breast tenderness and constant bloating. I feel like I'm getting a glimpse of what my tummy will look like in a few months :)
I have quite a few symptoms already lol extremely tired and sore breasts and nausea, but they only last in first trimester i think x

I am actually amazed at the symptoms I am feeling already and how strong they are! I feel like I can smell everything, good or bad, 20 feet away I smell it like it's right in my face! Bloating is crazy, I have started eating smaller meals more frequently and it helps, but only a little. The most noticeable things at night are my back aches and headaches. Of course I opt to sucking it up every night instead of taking something for it

Im having bad cramps and been bleeding for 3 days now been to hospital and had early scan she said it all looked normal and having blood tests tomorrow but hospital told me to take codeine but not sure i dont even want to have paracetomol just like you trying to suck it up x

Oh wow. I am so glad I haven't had any bleeding. It would leave me so uneasy even though it's so common. My friend spotted her whole first trimester and everything was fine. At least you were able to have a scan and hear everything looks normal. Kudos to you for sucking it up :)
Hi thank you, and thank you for telling me about your friend that is very comforting to hear it can be normal been so worried.

I have heard and read it is extremely common. I've never experienced it, but my friend who has had it all through all three of her pregnancies and is now 25 weeks and has not had any spotting since week 20 :)
thank you for telling me that, can put my mind at rest now and see what the blood test shows tomorrow, i hope you feel better soon i heard the 1st trimester is the worst

I'm 6 weeks due April 20.  This is my 5 and unplanned. Oops. Anyway I have indigestion, bloating, nausea, I feel full and hungry all the time. I have given up soda and dairy and that helps a little. Hoping it'll pass in another month. I feel awful and I'm not sleeping but exhausted all day.
I just found out im pregnant and am due 27th April 2014. I have nausa and everything I eat tastes plain

I'm due April 18th ish so that means I'm 6w 4d along! We are trying to hide it from everyone for a little while but We are so excited! This is our 3rd baby and I am so sick.  Unfortunately I stay sick through my pregnancies. Not so much fun for me. Good luck with the spotting issue. That would be scary.
I'm due the same day you are!! For some reason I have sore nipples not breast gagging but no vomit and saliva I have to have a spit cup anyone else have that going on?

Hi ladies I'm also 5weeks due April 28 like @jessiezp as of right now no symptoms at all but sore breast my only problem is that I can't sleep for nothing and always thirsty I hope we all keep in touch thru our pregnancy btw I have 2 boys with this pregnancy I don't want to know the sex till birth

I totally have the immense amount of saliva! It's annoying but not too bad. For some reason the last 4 days my body doesn't want to sleep longer than 6 hours a night, which would be fine if I weren't pregnant, fortunately I have been able to car nap here and there and that helps with it. I'm lucky enough with my kids being old enough they're good on their own for a bit if mom need to lay down :)

I'm due April 14 with my third (unplanned). My other two kids will be 8 and almost 6 by then. Luckily they're old enough to understand that mummy is a little sick, sore, tired and crazy right now! I also work full time so a day sleep isn't an option until the weekends.
Hi I am also 5 weeks today. Our unofficial due date is also 4/30. Been having lots of cramping...bad heartburna little nausea here and there but nothing aserious.  Good luck to all
I'm due April 13,  very excited! Are you telling people yet?
Has anyone told anyone yet? Or waiting till 3 months x

This is my 4th child. I have a 12 yr old 10 yr old and an 9yr old have sore breasts feel sick all the time and am drinking none stop. My taste buds are playing up so much as everything I eat has no flavour so putting bbq sauce with everything. Anyone else have this problem? ?

I'm so glad some of you other moms are experiencing cramping too. I feel like I am cramping all the time, and sometimes worry about it, even though it's normal.We have only told our best friends and our kids right now. We plan on telling our parents in person, which unfortunately won't be for quite awhile since we are so busy. My parents also live 2 hours away, so we won't see them till thanksgiving. I'm too excited to hold it in for 3 months!
Im due the 16th of april 7 weels today :)Have nausea n dry reaching. Lil weight gain n muscle stretching. . Got my first scan in 2 week s :)

I'm due April 17th with my 2nd. I already have a little girl who's 5. With my first I bled quite a lot on and off in first trimester but everything was fine. No bleeding so far with this one, I'll be 7 weeks tomorrow. Amount of bloating is unreal tho! Not really had any other symptoms so far...

I am due april 10. So tomorrow I am 2 mo. This is my second. A lot differnt pregnancy.  I am showing extremely fast. And breast are tender. I almost feel like I'm 6 mo prego lol. But I'm still excited. I can't keep my mouth shut so everyone knew as soon as I was prego. Lol. I was too excited. I am very nervous I have a three year old now and he is all about attention. So I  nervous how he will do.

I'm glad to hear that others are cramping, too! Mine come and go and are luckily not nearly as bad as my usual period cramps, so I haven't been uncomfortable. The bloating is just getting ridiculous though! By the time the evening rolls around, I look like I'm in my second trimester. I'm a vegetarian so cutting out culprits like beans and green veggies isn't an option. I hope this let's up soon! As for telling people, I've only told very close friends and some immediate family. My idea is to have someone to share the excitement with who can also be a good support to me if something should go wrong early in the pregnancy. Once I hear the heart beat next month, it will be very difficult for me to not tell every single person I come into contact with! I'm so looking forward to being a mama!

Hello! I'm due on April 24! Congratulations to everyone and good luck. I've also been experiencing some yucky symptoms - fatigue, nausea, food aversions(nothing tastes good or right) and boob sensitivity. This will be our second child! So excited.

I am with you there on the bloating Jessiezp! I am almost worried to walk around in the evening outside afraid that one or our neighbours might see and ask about it. I wouldn't deny it either, lol, trying to be proud of my bloated belly. I guess it all comes with the baby. I just don't remember having this with my first, mind you that was over 10 years ago and a lot has seemed to slip my mind about pregnancy an labour!!
I am having bloating too and not eating much and headache has started today, i just want to tell people already just family know at the minute

I am glad to know I am not the only one who isnt having some form of nausea yet. Thought something was wrong with me. I am having extreme bloating ALOT of cm...food aversions yes...nothing tastes right to me either. ..some cravings but once I get it I dont want it. I am EXHAUSTED all the time. We told almost everyone against my wishes. ... my mom was Too excited and let it out.  I wanted to wait since I'm already high risk.

Hello my name is tara. I am between 5-6 weeks went for bloodwork yesterday. I need to go again tomorrow to make sure my hcg levels are getting higher then i can have a sono. Doc is being on top of me since last sept i had a miscarriage with twins at 6 weeks. I just started spotting brown stingy stuff today. Only when i wipe though. Doc said other day it could be from embryo planting to my uteral wall. We did have intercourse 3 days ago also. O hope ots not another miscarriage. I have a 3.5 yr old son. I didnt have any issues until i had my mirena removed middle of last yr. Any ideas on discharge? Thank you all

But my husband swears it'll be April 25th his bday.Symptoms: lots of cramps (why don't the books include this?!) And 2 diarea episodes inside of 4 days. I'm gluten free (no wheat) so I think that is why I'm not bloating up. Fingers crossed it stays that way!
We are expecting our 3 baby the beginning of May. According to my last period our due date is May 5. Would love a pregnant friend!!
I'm due april 19 :-)

Just found out yesterday n confirmed today. Est due date is April 29, 2014. It'll be my husband and I second. Excited but a lil hung up on due date. My gram passed away 4 yrs ago from lung cancer that day so... I know kinda stupid.  No symptoms but peeing nonstop.  O had a rough pregnancy with my daughter. Sever bleeding the entire first trimester, undiagnosed preeclampsia... Praying for a better one this time around. Wish me luck lol good luck to y'all

I'm due April 13th, it will be my 3rd, 1st with my husband. I've had sore breast, fatigue and smelling is heighten.  My husband has a son from a previous marriage and i have a son and daughter from onewe have been together for 4 years and wasn't trying for a child but well welcome one. Only hang for me was telling him, he is 14 years old than myself and his only child is 20, he took it?better than I did.

I am due april 8th! It was so exciting to find out we were pregnant after trying for a yr and a half. Im some what nervous seeing as my daughter is 7 already. Big gap for me! But I have had terrible nausea and breast tenderness. If your feeling nauseous,  I highly recommend sea bands. They work wonders for me :) good luck!

question: I just found out I'm 5 weeks pregnant! This is such exciting news for my husband and I. We have 3 other children, all from previous relationships and all 10 years old!! :) I figured out I'm due April 30. Just was curious if anyone else was due around then who would like to chat and compare symptoms :)
title: Anyone else due in April?
